items.name: gantt_getting_started
items.title: Getting Started with Ext Gantt
items.description: This guide will allow you to get started with Ext Gantt.

items.name: sencha_cmd
items.title: Using the Gantt with Sencha Cmd
items.description: This guide will show you how to use Ext Gantt with Sencha Cmd.

items.name: gantt_styling_guide
items.title: Styling and customizing Ext Gantt
items.description: This guide will show you what parts of Gantt component can be customized and how.

items.name: gantt_ext_styling_guide
items.title: Using Ext functionality for styling and customizing Ext Gantt
items.description: This guide will show you how to utilize built-in ExtJs functionality for easier customization and better working experience with Ext Gantt.

items.name: gantt_data_integration
items.title: Data integration guide
items.description: This guide will show you how to set up a PHP/MySQL based Ext Gantt.

items.name: gantt_calendars
items.title: Using calendars
items.description: This guide describes all the features of Ext Gantt related to calendars.

items.name: gantt_scheduler_localization
items.title: Localizing Scheduler and Gantt
items.description: This guide describes how to localize Bryntum Scheduler and Gantt.

items.name: gantt_split_task
items.title: Splitting tasks
items.description: This guide describes how to use the split task feature

items.name: crud_manager
items.title: CRUD manager general information
items.description: This guide describes the generic parts of the CRUD manager applicable for both Scheduler and Gantt.

items.name: gantt_crud_manager
items.title: Using CRUD manager with Ext Gantt
items.description: This guide describes the Gantt specific details of implementing the CRUD manager.

items.name: gantt_constraints
items.title: Using task constraints in Ext Gantt
items.description: This guide describes the task constraints mechanism in Ext Gantt.

items.name: scheduler_getting_started
items.title: Getting Started with Ext Scheduler.
items.description: This guide will allow you to get started with Ext Scheduler.

items.name: scheduler_extension
items.title: Sencha Architect 3 extension
items.description: This guide gives brief information about extension installation and usage
